project.name: gjs-plugin-archetype
project.description:
-------------------------------------------------------- Project gjs-plugin-archetype --------------------------------------------------------
Archetype for generating the basic structure of a Maven plugin. Example of use: This command generates the test-project project:
mvn archetype:generate \ -DarchetypeGroupId=org.gjs.maven.archetypes \ -DarchetypeArtifactId=gjs-plugin-archetype \ -DarchetypeVersion=1.0.0-SNAPSHOT \ -Dname=test -Drule=test \ -Dversion=1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
==================================================================================== Archetype Parameters:
* name: Name of the maven plugin. Always lowercase. Allows two words separated by a hyphen.
* rule: Name of the sample rule. Always lowercase. Allows two words separated by a hyphen.
* groupId: The group of the project artifact.
* artifactId: The name of the project artifact. Default is plugin. Not required.
* package: The project packaging of the sourc code. Default is org.gjs.maven.archetypes. Not required.
* version: The project version. Default is 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT. Not required.
====================================================================================
